jsLib:
//如果你的自定义仓库链接也有github备用下载，可以更改这里。
var _备用链接 = "https://github.com/Luoyacheng/yuedu";
sortUrl:
<js>
try {
var url = source.getLoginInfoMap().get('自定义仓库链接');
} catch(err) {url='';}

function jiemi() {
let jiam = java.ajax(java.base64Decode('aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRlZS5jb20vbHljNDg2L3l1ZWR1Mi9yYXcvbWFpbi/orqLpmIUv5rSb5aiF5qmZL3R4dC9qaWFtaQ=='));
let jiem = java.hexDecodeToString(jiam);
u=jiem.match(/\u94fe\u63a5="([^"]+)"/)[1];
m=jiem.match(/;\u5bc6\u7801="([^"]+)"/)[1];
t=jiem.match(/;\u7279\u6b8a="([^"]+)"/)[1];
return [u,m,t];
}

var zz = 0;
if (/^https:\/\/gitee.com\/[^\/]+\/[^\/]+\/tree\/[^\/]+/.test(url)) {
	java.toast('\n构建分类中...');
	}
	else if (url == '') {
		let jm = jiemi();
		let sbl = source.getVariable();
		if (sbl==jm[1]) {
			java.toast('\n欢迎🎉');
			zz = 1;
			url = jm[2];
			} else if (/^(?:字典|目录|净化)$/.test(sbl)) {
				java.toast('\n使用：'+sbl+' 分类');
				url = jm[0].replace('订阅',sbl);
			}else {
				java.toast('\n使用默认分类中');
				url = jm[0];}
	}
	else {
		java.toast('\n填写的仓库地址错误\n使用默认地址');
		let jm = jiemi();
		url = jm[0];}
Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(50);
let rr = java.ajax(url);
let nm = com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.read(rr, "$..trees[*].name");
let ur = com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.read(rr,'$..trees[*].url');
Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(50);
let re = '';
for (let i = 0; i < nm.length; i++) {
	re = re +nm[i]+'::https://gitee.com'+ur[i]+'\n';
	}
	
let kk = source.get('kklyc');
//获取出错后会反复自动切换单/多分类识别模式(需手动刷新分类)
if (kk!=1&&zz==0) {
	re = '默认::'+url;
	}
re
</js>
variableComment:
如果有需要，可输入密码
比如“字典”、“目录”
设置后需要刷新分类
